org.micromanager.display

Interface DisplayDidShowImageEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MMEvent

    public interface DisplayDidShowImageEvent
extends MMEvent
    This event posts when a DataViewer displays an image(s). It only posts once the image is actually showing The default implementation of this event posts on the DataViewer event bus. Register using DataViewer.registerForEvents(Object).
